alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 29 at 8:58PM MDT until March 30 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...For the Sacramento Mountains and east slopes. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will lead to hazardous travel conditions, especially along north/south roads and highways. Damage to weak structures is possible with the strong winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in during strong winds and blowing dust, especially near loose objects and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet
